title: DDFP 604: Week 5 Red Challenge Flag Picks & Giants strategy going forward
itunes:title: DDFP 604: Week 5 Red Challenge Flag Picks & Giants strategy going forward
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Matt “Money” Smith, Handsome Hank and Cynthia Frelund to discuss the great Tom Petty (9:40) Hank's trip to London (13:26), and what's the best option for the New York Giants going forward (31:20). The group also picked the biggest college football games of the week (18:50). Lastly, EmmaVP reads her Week 5 "TV Guide" sitcom edition descriptions for the biggest matchups of the week for the guys to preview and make their Red Challenge Flag picks (43:09).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
